stories.title: You’ll soon be able to use an iPhone as a Mac webcam
Quantum Weirdness Now a Matter of Time (2016)

stories.text: find it difficult to understand why every time Elon Musk is asked about what he is most concerned about - he says population decline - just today he tweeted about population collapse vis-a-vis china - finding it difficult to resolve total end game this way - how do we get to the point there are so few people on earth we are stuck? -- Especially given technology like maternal spindle transfer & CRISPR --
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is Elon Musk so concerned with population decline?

stories.text:
This seems to have started happening (at least for me) a week or two ago. Emails and websites that used to load stall when fetching a script from google.com until you turn off "Hide My IP Address From Tracker" in Safari and Mail's Privacy settings. Fetching that same script in a separate tab works fine.

This feels wrong to me, but this might be a "me" problem.

Is anyone else experiencing this?
stories.title: Tell HN: Apple's “Hide My IP Address from Trackers” Feature Breaks Many Websites
